title: Boost Mobile Campaign Font (files attached)
content:
Boost Mobile has been using this font on their marketing campaign. Anyone have any idea what it is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [boost\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183024/http:/typophile.com/files/boost_1.jpg) | 42.94 KB |
| [boost\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183024/http:/typophile.com/files/boost_2.jpg) | 66.72 KB |
| [boost\_3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183024/http:/typophile.com/files/boost_3.jpg) | 22.65 KB |
author: typotypophile

comments.content:
Commissionned typeface for BoostMobile called BoostNeo Grotesk.  
 [See here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183024/http:/typophile.com/node/51299), [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183024/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45009) and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020183024/http:/typophile.com/node/48925).
